name: Boniface Muriuki
bio: Boniface Muriuki understands the unique frustrations—and hidden potential—of tiny kitchens. Over 15 years, he’s transformed cramped countertops across three continents into functional culinary havens, earning recognition as a James Beard Award-nominated innovator and the bestselling author of The Micro Kitchen Manifesto.

alumniOf.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

awards: Best Forex Trading Coach in Kenya - 2023
description: Patrick Mahinge is a Kenya entrepreneur who also enjoys mountain biking.

name: Jane Smith
bio: Jane Smith is a financial analyst and guest contributor specializing in stock market trends and investment strategies.
